text: Belk is an American department store chain. It was founded in 1888 by William Henry Belk in Monroe, North Carolina. It has 300 locations in 16 states. It is headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina. Belk stores offer apparel, shoes, accessories, cosmetics, home furnishings, and a wedding registry.
